name: Blocky's Adventure 2
description:
The public beta is out now! Frequent updates will occur because the game is still in beta stage.

Jump over obstacles by pressing UP, W or SPACE.
Slide under obstacles by pressing DOWN or S.

The longer you run, the more coins you get! Spend these coins on skins for your character and different maps. You may encounter coins on the ground as you run, pick them up for a bonus of 5 coins. You may also encounter a diamond coin on the ground, pick those up for 1 diamond coin.
